description: Great little 2 player game; we play it a lot.
I like this game alright, but it's a tad to long for a quick 2 player filler and its too light and short for when its a 2 player game night.
A game that I have played so many times that I feel I fully understand but will never fully understand. ARGH

title: Girlfriend...
description: Girlfriend and I have been playing this religiously on our phones for the last 2 months. Finally decided to pick up the physical edition. While not as efficient as the digital version, the tangibility and quality of the product is excellent. Love love love this game.
